document.full_text: the new rule is intended to encourage coaches to teach the proper technique to avoid the kind of hits to the head and neck area that the n.f.l. cracked down on last season.
document.title: n.f.l. will fine teams whose players are punished repeatedly for improper hits
lines_and_colors: the new rule is intended to encourage coaches to teach the proper technique to avoid the kind of hits to the head and neck area that the n.f.l. cracked down on last season.
